CIPHER.197.cipherString: Complainers change their complaints, but they never reduce the amount of time spent in complaining.
CIPHER.197.question: A quote by Mason Cooley has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.197.author: Mason Cooley

CIPHER.174.cipherString: Logical consequences are the scarecrows of fools and the beacons of wise men.
CIPHER.174.question: A quote by T. H. Huxley has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has ACONSO somewhere in it.
CIPHER.174.author: T. H. Huxley

CIPHER.195.cipherString: Make time to reflect on the impact that your habits have on yourself and others then adjust accordingly when needed!
CIPHER.195.question: A quote by Felecia Etienne has been encoded using the K2 Patristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told that RHPG maps to DOTH.
CIPHER.195.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.175.cipherString: Success will be within your reach only when you start reaching out for it.
CIPHER.175.question: The following quote by Stephen Richards needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of TUBES
CIPHER.175.author: Stephen Richards

CIPHER.192.cipherString: aye enver regrte naything. Ebcause every littlle detail fo yoru ilfe si what made ewe into who yew are in the end.
CIPHER.192.question: Decode a quote by Drew Barrymore has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher.  Unfortunately the message was received over a bad connection, so there are some errors in it.
CIPHER.192.author: Drew Barrymore

CIPHER.187.cipherString: In a very real sense we have two minds, one that thinks and one that feels
CIPHER.187.question: The following quote by Daniel Goleman needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of MOVIE and polybius key of OBSERVING.
CIPHER.187.author: Daniel Goleman

CIPHER.196.cipherString: Los retos son lo que hacen la vida interesante, y superarlos es lo que hace que la vida tenga un significado.
CIPHER.196.question: A quote by an unknown person in Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.196.author: unknown
CIPHER.196.translation: Challenges are what make life interesting, and overcoming them is what give life a purpose.

CIPHER.189.cipherString: Love the giver more than the gift.
CIPHER.189.question: The following quote by Brigham Young needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=9 and b=13.
CIPHER.189.author: Brigham Young

CIPHER.178.cipherString: Remember that the most beautiful things in the world are the most useless; peacocks and lilies for instance.
CIPHER.178.question: A quote by John Ruskin has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.178.author: John Ruskin

CIPHER.183.cipherString: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
CIPHER.183.question: Decode this quote by David Hume which has been encoded using the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.183.author: David Hume

CIPHER.184.cipherString: Even if you play perfectly, a fault of your opponent's can destroy the entire beauty of the game.
CIPHER.184.question: A quote by Vladimir Kramnik has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.184.author: Vladimir Kramnik

CIPHER.176.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 1895 1027 3046 298167.. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.182.cipherString: Live life on your terms, make decisions based on facts and not on opinions, and blaze your own path.
CIPHER.182.question: A quote by Felecia Etienne has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it ends with the word PATH.
CIPHER.182.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.191.cipherString: A happy man is too satisfied with the present to dwell too much on the future.
CIPHER.191.question: The following quote by Albert Einstein needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of DOZEN and polybius key of FACTORIES.
CIPHER.191.author: Albert Einstein

CIPHER.186.cipherString: The goal of life is to make everyone and everything around you happy. With your act of kindness and compassion.
CIPHER.186.question: A quote by Shree Shambav has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.186.author: Shree Shambav

CIPHER.177.cipherString: Dream big and aim higher, give the universe permission to show you what's possible if you don't limit yourself!
CIPHER.177.question: Decode this quote by Felecia Etienne which has been encoded using the Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.177.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.194.cipherString: I prefer to think of myself as a musician who is still learning and trying to do something every time out.
CIPHER.194.question: A quote by Geddy Lee has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word EVERY.
CIPHER.194.author: Geddy Lee

CIPHER.193.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 2689 4892 3460 1577. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.179.cipherString: Everything seems simpler from a distance.
CIPHER.179.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Gail Tsukiyama using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.179.author: Gail Tsukiyama

CIPHER.185.cipherString: Deal with the world the way it is, not the way you wish it was.
CIPHER.185.question: A quote by John Chambers has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with DEAL WITH.
CIPHER.185.author: John Chambers

CIPHER.190.cipherString: A wise man is he who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
CIPHER.190.question: A quote by Epictetus has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word THOSE.
CIPHER.190.author: Epictetus

CIPHER.181.cipherString: One must never look for happiness: one meets it by the way.
CIPHER.181.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Isabelle Eberhardt using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.181.author: Isabelle Eberhardt

CIPHER.180.cipherString: Music has always been my protection against the world, from a very young age. I feel safe inside of a jam.
CIPHER.180.question: A quote by Trey Anastasio has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the words OF and MY.
CIPHER.180.author: Trey Anastasio

CIPHER.188.cipherString: He that diggeth a pit shall fall into it.
CIPHER.188.question: The following strange phrases encode a quote by Old Testament using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the cipher text ALONG SHINY STOCK BOXES decodes to be THAT.
CIPHER.188.author: Old Testament
